scripts.app:dev: $npm_package_config_pyup && cd app && export FLASK_APP=flaskr && export FLASK_ENV=development
scripts.app:init: $npm_package_config_pyup && cd app && export FLASK_APP=flaskr && export FLASK_ENV=development && echo 'Creating database...' && flask init-db
scripts.app:run: $npm_package_config_pyup && cd app && export FLASK_APP=flaskr && export FLASK_ENV=development && flask run
